step.framework.config
Class Config

java.lang.Object
  step.framework.config.Config

public class Config
extends java.lang.Object

Config class is a singleton properties collection that simplifies access to property file based configuration. Applications must load config before trying to access init parameters or else rely on automatic default property file loading.

getInitParameter

public java.lang.String getInitParameter(java.lang.String key)
Reads a configuration parameter. If the configuration has not been initialized, tries to load default property file.

Parameters:
key - string that identifies the parameter
Returns:
parameter value or null if parameter not found

getInitProperties

public java.util.Properties getInitProperties()
Returns a shallow clone of the configuration parameters

Returns:
properties collection

Clears the configuration
